combatSkills.name: Radiant Chord
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Mag.+90% and Wind Attack Dmg.+100%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Attunement
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Str. & Mag.-40%/4 turns and [Self] +3 Actions (Lo Wind M.Attack a Foe w/Hi Critical Rate)

combatSkills.name: Shattering Pulse
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Hi Wind M.Attack w/ Hi Unguard Rate & Status Debuff and [Allies] Status Buff +2 turns

combatSkills.name: Harmonic Flap
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Increase S.A Gauge Charge gain by 33%, Mag. & Dex.+30% and 35% HP Regen/4 turns

passiveSkills.name: Binding Strike
passiveSkills.description: [Foe] Regular Attack when countering and Status Debuff+1 turn
